com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.storage

Class FileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.storage.FileSource

  • public class FileSource
extends Object
    Holds a central reference to the core's DefaultFileSource for as long as there are active mapviews / offline managers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileSource.ResourceTransformCallback
      This callback allows implementors to transform URLs before they are requested from the internet.

      • getInstance

      • getCachePath

      • isExternalStorageReadable

        public static boolean isExternalStorageReadable()
        Checks if external storage is available to at least read. In order for this to work, make sure you include <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> (or WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) for API level < 18 in your app Manifest.

        Code from https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/data/data-storage.html#filesExternal

        Returns:
        true if external storage is readable

      • setAccessToken

        public void setAccessToken(@NonNull
                           String accessToken)

      • getAccessToken

        public String getAccessToken()

      • setApiBaseUrl

        public void setApiBaseUrl(String baseUrl)

      • setResourceTransform

        public void setResourceTransform(FileSource.ResourceTransformCallback callback)
        Sets a callback for transforming URLs requested from the internet

        The callback will be executed on the main thread once for every requested URL.

        Parameters:
        callback - the callback to be invoked or null to reset

                 throws Throwable
